programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: A couple ask Antonio to design the perfect outdoor area for their Savannah cat and foster kittens. He builds connected catwalks and intricate climbing surfaces.

programme.title: Animal Cops Phoenix
programme.desc: Investigators look into reports of an illegal dog fight and discover three pit bulls urgently needing their help. Plus, a terrified dog is rescued from under a trailer.

programme.title: Animal Cops Phoenix
programme.desc: In this Special Edition, the Investigators of the Arizona Humane Society look back on dramatic cases where their intervention has made the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Sharkwrecked: Crash Landing
programme.desc: Palau im Westpazifik ist ein Tropenparadies wie aus dem Bilderbuch. Über 350 Inseln reihen sich auf, wie an einer Perlenschnur. Aber im Zweiten Weltkrieg spielten sich hier dramatische Szenen ab. Etwa 80 Flugzeuge der U.S. Air Force sturzten ins Meer. Oft segelten die Piloten am Fallschirm hinterher. Der wahre Horror begann erst im Wasser: Denn die Sudsee wimmelt von Haien! Ex-Soldat Paul de Gelder und Rettungstaucher James Glancy begeben sich auf die Spuren der Soldaten. In einem riskanten Selbstversuch mussen die Manner gefraSSigen Raubfischen sowie korperlicher Erschopfung trotzen.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Sandy Prince is enjoying a swim in a river when she is attacked by a crocodile. A cougar leaps out at Phil Anderson in Washington state; can he fight it off?

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Jay has one lady in his life and thats his ferocious attack cat, Marley. Marley will tear apart anyone who crosses her path - including Jay.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: A pregnant Bindi continues to work saving animals at the Wildlife Hospital. And, Steves dream of breeding cassowaries may finally become a reality.

programme.title: Take Back the Harbour
programme.desc: A group of ambitious students at a school on Governors Island, New York, have taken on a conservation project - to restore the once-bountiful oyster supply in New York Harbour.

programme.title: The Aquarium
programme.desc: At Georgia Aquarium, every birth, egg laid or hatched is very special to its staff. These meaningful experiences enrich the lives of visitors and the team.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Amy performs surgery on a canine who was impaled with a stick, while Dr. Baier helps Kino, a hound in heat even though shes been spayed twice.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: A California restaurant is after a tank for their new location in Santa Monica! The owners want a nostalgic feel and replicas to represent its 70-year history.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Wildlife agents are called out to rescue a black bear that has been hit by a car. Meanwhile, investigators confront the owner of an illegal pig slaughter operation.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: When a CCTV camera films a man beating a cat, investigators have to catch him. Neglect leaves two dogs near death and owls are rescued from a demolition site.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The Jackson family suffer from a cabin on the verge of collapse and predators threatening their 100 chickens. The Raneys use all new ingenuity to make the cabin liveable.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Boone receives an anonymous tip about a hunter who illegally shot a deer. Plus, McGee questions a man for being in possession of venomous copperhead snakes.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Petes build in Washington will fuse action and relaxing. With a bouncy-bridge entryway and a zip-line through the forest, its a thrill-seekers haven!

programme.title: Pit Bulls And Parolees
programme.desc: Villalobos are invited to the Dog Bowl, which is an amazing opportunity for rescues to get adopted. Plus, a couple are looking to adopt their first dog.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Jackson gets his most vicious feline attack in years, at the claws of troubled cat, May. Plus, he helps a nervous wreck of a guardian move her feral cats to Canada.

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: A couple need Antonios help to gain back control of their space. Their five rescue bunnies have taken over the house and they want a designated area for them.

programme.desc: A female slow loris has weight problems that stop her from becoming pregnant. Keepers take the penguin colony for a CT scan and an ocopy has pain in his hooves.

programme.desc: The Wolfpack braces for a looming wildfire that threatens completion of the barn. Ami and Billy return with an important health update.

programme.title: I Was Prey: Shark Week
programme.desc: In Southern California, a woman is enjoying a relaxing day at the beach when shes confronted with a great white shark that drags her underwater. Off the northern coast of Hawaii, a spearfisherman is ambushed by a massive tiger shark.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Oncologist Jenny Helm is faced with much-loved family cat Misha, who has a worrying lump in her chest and a stray pup called Ellie who is brought in for pioneering surgery.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete takes on his first international treehouse in breathtaking Norway. Working alongside a local builder named Frode, the one-of-a-kind, 24 ft high retreat sleeps 8, and allows for stunning views of the nearby lake.

programme.title: Bad Dog

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy fishes, a penguin comes over and sees that the bears bucket is empty. He decides to help him and catches piles of fish. Impressed, the bear brings the penguin back to the cabin, where a friendship rapidly strikes up. This pleasant and friendly new companion quickly arouses the Lemmings curiosity. They lure the penguin away on the sly and replace him with another one whos not nearly as clever. Grizzy will quickly see through the trickery.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy settles into the couch by the fireside, the Lemmings come charging into the living room on their new mount, the vacuum cleaner. Irritated, the bear throws the mechanical charger into the fireplace, which blows up. Freezing air sweeps into the cabin. Seeking a source of heat, Grizzy decides to move into the science station greenhouse where the temperature is controlled by a drone. But the bear is unaware of what he carries in his luggage: the Lemmings!

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Portly traps a butterfly in a jar in order to observe it, but when grounded himself, he realizes that no one likes confinement.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Toad resolves to keep fit in order to win the racing challenge thrown down by the weasels.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: When Toad practises opera singing, he is so dreadful he has to practise high in the sky in his hot air balloon. Could he end up being the first Toad in space?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean gets in a flap when a monster turns up in his cake-mix. The good news, though, is that the monster turns out to be a harmless baby bird. The bad news is that it grows into a huge stork and takes over his home. Bean attempts to return it to the wild, and finds teaching it to fly makes his arms ache.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The frogspawn in Beans bathroom begin hatching, and before long the house is full of angry amphibians - just as the mayor is about to arrive for tea.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is invited to lunch at the stately home of an aristocratic lady who isnt all she seems. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: When Glitch’s compartment empties out and a huge amount of junk floats out, Ella suggests that Slippy get rid of it. They all head to Vesta. Slippy is enchanted by the amount of stuff on the planetoid. Madhu finds something that looks like a robot so the gang sets out to find the other pieces. They quickly put together an impressive robot they call Victor. Victor is designed to recycle and he happily does just that. But when Slippy brings him back to the Clubhouse, they soon realise Victor needs to be in his home.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Its Priyas birthday, so the gang is looking for something special as a gift for her. Ella suggests a birthday star, which is a star that is the same light years away as your age.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ella stretches the truth a bit when she tells Angelie she can comet surf. She decides to try but finds its a lot harder than it looks. Slippy adds rockets to an asteroid so Ella can practice on that instead.

programme.title: Mike Brewer: Born Dealer
programme.desc: Mike trades a classic Citroen for an F-Type Jag. Later, he visits a classic car auction to test the market and tries his hand at Crown Green Bowls.

programme.title: Twin Turbos
programme.desc: The DeBertis race to finish an offroad truck for NASCAR driver Joey Logano, and Brad trains with a local stock-car race team hoping to take the next step to NASCAR.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike thinks hes on to a winner when he finds a budget Nissan Skyline supercar. Can Edd transform this modern classic into a customised drift racer?

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Sculptor Nick Elphick works on a life-sized stag statue thats missing its head. Plus, metalsmith Ted Edley restores an alien-themed shooting game.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike heads to the USA to find the grandfather of four wheel drives, the Willys Jeep. But will major repairs and high transport costs stop them making a profit?

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Delve into the myths, misconceptions, truths and amazing mysteries of our unique universe. Could life exist on Mars? Is time travel possible and does Einsteins theory of relativity support it?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Could claims of The Nine - a federation of extraterrestrial beings who monitor and influence mankind - have any substance? Some experts believe so.

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways The World Will End
programme.desc: When rogue aliens launch a surprise attack on Earth, people are left dying in the streets, world governments are obliterated, cities are destroyed and a deadly virus is unleashed. Can mankind survive, or is this the end?

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: With the aid of a team of experts and eyewitness testimony, ‘Serial Killer Earth’ delves deep into the destructive power of natural disasters, and in the process explains how they compare with natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Clash Of The Gods
programme.desc: Enter creator JRR Tolkiens fantastical world of hobbits, orcs and wizards and uncover the real life influences that shaped his epic fantasy, the Lord of the Rings.

programme.title: Lost Gold Of World War II
programme.desc: A team of Americans attempts to solve one of the great mysteries of World War II. With the help of an eyewitness, they explore a mountain in the Philippines where Japanese general Yamashita is believed to have buried a vast treasure during the war.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: The Loch Ness Monsters possible demise is investigated by Robert Rines, who saw remains while mapping the lake floor. MonsterQuest uses ROVs, sonar, and cameras in search of evidence for Nessies death at the lakes bottom.

programme.desc: Marty and members of the team travel north to a Viking settlement, and uncover more evidence that may connect descendants of the Vikings to the Knights Templar. And back on Oak Island, new clues suggest Lot 5 was a place of worship.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: For hundreds of years there have been legends of vast treasures hidden throughout the United States. But are these legends of lost treasures tall tales? Or is it possible that incredible valuables are out there, waiting to be discovered?

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are hitting the road to look for treasures in Tampa, Florida. Helming a crew of experts, the guys will plunder everything from Pokemon cards to Steve McQueens motorcycle, hoping to make waves in the Sunshine State.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum head to Louisville to bet on a collection of vintage spirits, a pair of goggles signed by Kentucky Derby jockey Jon Court, and a vintage pedal car. Later, they visit the Louisville Slugger factory, for a home run of a surprise.

programme.title: Kevin Costners The West
programme.desc: In Gold Rush California, Mexican immigrant Joaquin Murrieta forms a gang of outlaws that spreads terror across the newly formed state. A posse of California Rangers, led by the fearsome Harry Love, takes Murrieta down.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is counting down the top ten locations around the world that might be hiding alien bases, including a cavern beneath the ice of Antarctica, a lake in China that is a hotspot for UFOs, and a pyramid under the slopes of Mt. Denali.

programme.title: The Unbelievable With Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: From a headless chicken that lives over one year, to an out-of-this-world celestial body where it rains molten glass, we explore the most astonishing bodies through these truly unbelievable stories.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum journey to St. Paul, Minnesota, where they unearth an impressive trilobite fossil collection. Then, Rick grows a heart for a first edition "Tin Woodman of Oz" book, and Chum offers his two cents on an ancient coin collection.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: When Investigator Katie Paige rejoins Andy and Paul at a Colorado ranch where strange phenomena terrorized her as a child, a newly revealed site of concentrated activity results in the discovery of a possible portal above the ranch.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Andy and Paul investigate a desert hotbed of strange activity where local lore speaks of an entity called "Goldie", they find that not only is there scientific evidence backing up these stories, but other entities may not want these stories told.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: Optimism abounds when the Fellowship returns to Smiths Cove and finds evidence of work that could finally uncover the legendary flood tunnels and lead them directly to the Money Pit.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: All over the world are forbidden triangles - mysterious regions where ships, planes and people enter and then just disappear. Do these locations defy the laws of physics? Or are there some places on Earth where we are simply not meant to go?

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum rev up their engines and roll into Detroit, Michigan. With their favourite experts in tow, Rick suits up for some samurai armour and tries to drive down the price of a luxury car collection.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: The hunt for extraordinary deals heats up as Rick, Corey, and Chum make their way down to Mesa, Arizona. Rick encounters a rugged Big Willy Jeep, Chum fangirls over some 2010 Justin Bieber trading cards, and Corey is struck by some Napoleonic medals.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: For years, Scotland has been an epicentre of otherworldly phenomena. It is home to ancient stone circles, stories of strange beings and a major hotspot for UFO sightings. Could it be that Scotland is a magnet for extraterrestrial visitors?

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: When the gigantic, invisible Bubble raises new questions for the team, possible answers suddenly fall from the sky.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did ocean scientists discover an unknown life form? Is blurry video of a mysterious creature in the snow the best Yeti footage out there? Did a Las Vegas family have a close encounter with ten-foot-tall aliens in their backyard?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Enormous manmade caves... Unexplainable structures... And underwater discoveries that challenge everything we know about the past...Is it possible that an advanced civilization inhabited Earth thousands of years ago?

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Andy and Paul team up with the investigator of Skinwalker Ranch to probe an abandoned New Mexico ranch whose owner claims is infested with malevolent demons; their attempts at communication with this phenomenon opens up a chilling "conversation."

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: As the team continues to uncover evidence that they may be close to the flood tunnels, cutting-edge, ground-penetrating radar results detect what could be the elusive offset chamber in the Money Pit.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: The Founding Fathers established the pillars of US freedom and democracy. Centuries later, new revelations emerge about their complexities, agendas, and hidden truths. What secrets lie behind the men who shaped America?

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum explore the Wolverines lair, facing mishaps with a Thunderbird, winning a "Star Wars" collection with the force, and snagging a signed jersey from football legend LaMarr Woodley, who later surprises them.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: This week, Rick, Corey, and Chum are hoping to strike it rich in the Mill City, Minneapolis, Minnesota. While there, the guys have a brush with a happy little Bob Ross painting, tackle a jersey signed by the Minnesota Vikings Purple People Eaters, and try to take home a prized vintage arcade collection. Later, the trio sink their teeth into some Juicy Lucys.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Along the Earths north 37th parallel there have been so many reports of UFOs and other mysterious events that it has been dubbed The UFO Superhighway. Could there be something about this latitude that is attracting extraterrestrial visitors?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Counting down the worlds top ten mysterious islands, including sites said to be home to giants and islands that disappear into thin air. Could these incredible sites provide evidence of extraterrestrial visitation?

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: A photograph of a UFO hovering over Holloman Air Force Base in New Mexico, a cabin built in a supposedly anomalous spot that defies gravity in the Redwood Forests, the origin of frightening howls recorded in Witset, British Columbia.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Did aerospace engineer Wernher von Braun have secrets collected by the Nazis in WWII, or access to technology recovered from Roswell? Is it possible that the worlds greatest rocket scientist found his inspiration not on our world, but another?

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: In this episode, Corey, Chum, and Rick are back in Vegas and unpacking all the treasures they found on the road and revealing some never-before-seen items. From belt buckles in Texas, to sleek yachts in Seattle, and 18th century pistols.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: As the team continues to uncover evidence that they may be close to the flood tunnels, cutting-edge, ground-penetrating radar results detect what could be the elusive offset chamber in the Money Pit.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: The Founding Fathers established the pillars of US freedom and democracy. Centuries later, new revelations emerge about their complexities, agendas, and hidden truths. What secrets lie behind the men who shaped America?

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum explore the Wolverines lair, facing mishaps with a Thunderbird, winning a "Star Wars" collection with the force, and snagging a signed jersey from football legend LaMarr Woodley, who later surprises them.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: Messy is in his garden looking at ants. He notices how they move in lines and come in and out of a hole in the ground! He wonders why – it’s off to Okido to find out! Messy crash lands in front of Zoe and Felix who are holding a cake. They tell him that it’s Mayor Oki’s birthday so they’re having a picnic so they zip off to the park to meet Zim, Zam and Zoom. Felix, Zoe and Messy are a little disappointed on arrival when see that the picnic food Zim, Zam and Zoom have brought is TINY…

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Apples rave review on her berryweb page of Strawberrys new dessert starts a booming mail order dessert business for Berry Bitty City. When Strawberrys stuffed-up nose makes her bake a bad-tasting cake, Apple, afraid the truth will hurt Strawberrys reputation, proclaims its delicious. The fib snowballs when the Queen of Berryvania reads Apples review and orders Strawberrys new cake for her ball. A madcap chase ensues as Apple tries to stop the airmail postal bees from delivering the cake.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry fails to see any benefit in rain when a visit to the beach is rained off.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry and Charlie have their football confiscated because they are unable to play football together without arguing.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A yellow-crested cockatoo joins Leo and Hero’s game of musical statues. After learning more about the bird, the Junior Rangers travel to the rainforest to take it home.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: When Henry hears that the Fat Controller’s grandchildren have chickenpox, he starts to worry about whether engines can get chickenpox too. Then he meets Thomas who has been splattered with mud and is carrying a wagon of chickens, and becomes convinced of it! It seems like every engine Henry meets is splattered with something that looks like spots and it’s not until the end of the day that poor Henry discovers that chickenpox is not really a problem for engines after all!

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: Oliver’s brake van, Toad, is in a cheery mood so he starts singing, which Oliver thinks sounds awful. And when Toad spots a stranded whale on the beach, Oliver doesn’t believe him. Luckily Thomas does. He thinks the whale needs help. So they tell the Fat Controller who alerts the Search and Rescue Centre. Flynn and Belle keep the whale wet and Butch tries to drag it back to the water, but the tide is too far out and it’s decided to transport the whale by rail to Brendam Docks to release it back into the water there. Oliver carries the whale on a flatbed and Toad sings to it to keep it calm.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu goes to the desert (with Fume) as an apprentice paleontologist to help Smeraldo in his excavations, tracking the skeleton of the legendary ancestor of all dragons, the “Dragonosaurus”. They get caught in a sandstorm with Stella Olivia and Smeraldo and take shelter in what happens to be the skeleton they were looking for.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: The firefighters’s ladder has disappeared. Grisu and Stella conduct the investigation… They find some clues. Helped by Thingys sense of smell, Grisu follows a track that leads them to Daisy, the florist. They quickly realize that this is a wrong trail. Then, Thingy leads them to the pizzeria but its only because the dog is very foodie. Step by step, the mystery becomes deeper and deeper, and Grisu ends up feeling discouraged. But even if they followed wrong tracks, they also gathered information and clues that finally help Grisu to find the "culprit" who is none other than… Fume. In fact, he didnt steal the ladder but he borrowed it instead, leaving a note that Thingy has eaten!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare tries to jump high enough to reach a last Autumn apple on a high branch. Unable to reach it, even with the help of Little Field Mouse, he gives up. But after watching some little salmon struggling to swim up a waterfall he decides to ‘think like a fish’ and try, try, try again until he reaches the tasty prize.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare falls into a muddy Autumn puddle and is delighted when he startles Little Grey Squirrel, who doesn’t recognize him at first. This starts a great new game of ‘Surprise!’ as they dress up in disguises to surprise the others. But they weren’t ready for Little Field Mouse, who works out a clever way of surprising her friends even more.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: When foxes lose a canine milk-tooth, there is a little initiation ritual - the hunt for the little slug. Berry is delighted to show that she is big now but her brothers are rather jealous that they were not initiated when they were little. Edmund is very worried and wonders if it is really necessary that his little sweetheart takes some risks…

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team have been building a new monorail system that goes across Spring City. Now they only have the last station to complete before the train takes its first journey that evening. But when Bob leaves Leo to finish the last station’s platform, Leo has trouble to concentrate on one job at a time. Leo tries to juggle three jobs at once with lots of different questions from Dizzy, Lofty and Tiny. Soon the cement is dripping onto the tracks, the platform tiles overload and break, and the roof crashes into the track and bends it out of shape. Leo thought things couldn’t get any worse until he realises that Bob is testing the train... and it’s heading for the bend in the track! As the train gets closer and closer, Leo finds it harder to decide what to do. But soon he takes control of the situation and concentrates.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Film director, Carl Parker, has commissioned Bob and his team to build the set and rocket for a movie – Space Robots 3. The clock is ticking, as they need to release it before Christmas. Leo reveals to Scoop he has aspirations to act, whilst Carl seems to have little control over his remote controlled robot D11D that keeps spooking Muck and running over Wendy’s toe. Saffi, who is hanging around the studio gates, is a big fan of D11D which leads an eager-to-impress Leo to claim he will be acting in the film, not just building sets. Leo with Scoop’s help then tries to get the director’s attention in various scenes whilst Bob’s team and the director are trying to get the set and rocket ready for filming. Leo decides to give up but then has an idea. The next morning, the first day’s filming is due to start but Leo is nowhere to be seen. Carl calls action on the first scene (between D11D and a much larger robot.)

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Its midday and Busytown citizens are dozing off all over town. Huckle, Sally and Lowly try to find out why. Noticing the number of sleeping people holding melted ice cream cones is an important clue. Ultimately, the kids discover that the ice cream truck isnt playing the usual perky tune to announce its arrival - its playing a lullaby./Someone has taken Huckle’s car and left their car in its place!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers are on a quest to reunite a lost Malayan tapir with its mother. But their visit to the rainforest leads them to another encounter with… the Malayan tiger!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo chances upon a dawn bat while sketching in his garden. The Junior Rangers embark on a search after sundown for the dawn bat’s cave.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: When Simon sees his friend Ferdinand riding his bike on two wheels, he is like, whoa! (but also a bit jealous). He tells his friend that he too is going to get rid of his training wheels tomorrow! With Daddy, he practices and practices and practices on two wheels but it’s one heck of a challenge and night is falling pretty fast. Simon goes to bed totally bummed out. No way is he going to be able to prove to his friend Ferdinand tomorrow that he knows how to ride on two wheels. But he just won’t give up. He wakes daddy up in the middle of the night and with only moonlight to guide him, he does it, he rides his bike on two wheels like a big boy!

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: On a spring day, Alfonso finds an unknown seedling by the stream. The cricket carefully guards the plant, which soon produces a special flower. Alfonso waters and tends to it daily, happily watching it grow. One morning at the end of summer, Alfonso notices that the flower has wilted and its petals have fallen off. Sadly, he gathers the petals and brings them into the house. In the afternoon, Dolly visits him, and later his friends come over to cheer him up. They bring delicious pancakes, but Alfonso is still sad. They go out to the stream, and Alfonso scatters the flower petals into the water, bidding them farewell with tears.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: As the end of summer approaches, the Lightning Beetle visits the fireflies and surprises them with a new book about planets and stars. After a conversation, one little firefly, when the others were already asleep, sets out to conquer the sky, but becomes completely exhausted and crashes. Doctor Owl diagnoses him with a fever and possible pneumonia, so he stays with him to heal. The other fireflies decide to surprise him. With the help of Berry, Dolly, Balthazar, Stanley, Flutter, and Eddy, they make colourful orbs, and the Lightning Beetle crafts the Sun. They suspend the planets on a hoop, which Eddy rotates with a contraption. They also instal tiny lights, resembling stars.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Dolly goes for a walk, and finally she is enriched with a beautiful cherry and a good friend.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry the snailboy and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They’re having many pretty adventures in 3X13 short tales, while they make new friends and get knowledges about the world around them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry becomes sad because he can not climb on the rainbow but Dolly makes him happy with an exceptionally creative present.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry the snailboy and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They’re having many pretty adventures in 3X13 short tales, while they make new friends and get knowledges about the world around them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly 01 Mepe
programme.desc: The characters in the Berry and Dolly stories are a bunch of tiny bugs and beetles who live alongside one another in the forest. The stories are lead by the title characters: Berry the snail and Dolly the ladybird. A variety of other characters join them in their fun and games throughout the series with the stories set in their forest home. All the characters’ houses, belongings and clothes perfectly match their individual appearance.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing discovers a hole in his favourite yellow wellies but he doesnt want to throw them away in the stinky dustbin.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop hear the familiar jingle of Gillys ice cream van and race across the park to find her. After a long run Bing finally gets his ice cream but as he waves goodbye to Gilly he tips the ice cream out of the cone.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: In the absence of a real plaster, Bing makes one out of sticky tape, but it’s so sticky that it hurts when he tries to take it off.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing loves Arlo the cat. They are friends. Bing strokes the kitty and they play hide and seek, but what happens when Bing meets a cat that isnt as friendly?

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Rupert builds a tree from wood instead of cutting one down. Soon, everyone wants one too, and the friends are so busy they forget the Advent celebration. The children decorate and save the day.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Molly loses the sack of Christmas wishes, and Tildas oven breaks. Thankfully, a wandering craftsman returns the sack and fixes the oven. But Tilda is sad—Aunt Emily can’t come for Christmas due to a broken leg.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda has invited her friends for Christmas, but a heavy snowfall prevents them from arriving. Luckily, Gertrude the mole digs a tunnel to Tilda’s house, ensuring the party can take place!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: When Little Nutbrown Hare sees Blue Bird building a nest, he thinks it looks like fun, so he and Little Field Mouse build one themselves. But its a bit too scratchy and tickly for them to get comfortable in. They give it to their friends to try out, but they also find it not quite right. Will anybody find their nest cozy and useful?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Big Nutbrown Hare teaches Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends to play hide-and-seek, but the boisterous little hare finds it hard to stay still and quiet, especially when the Spring meadow is full of birds, butterflies and lizards to chase. When he does manage to stay still and quiet he finds the creatures of the meadow come to him… even very shy ones.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare finds a very special feather with bright colours, spots and soft tickly bits. Just as he shows off to his friends how it can fly and float, a cheeky bird flies away with it. Little Grey Squirrel climbs her tree and discovers the bird using it to feather her nest. Will Little Nutbrown Hare find a way to get his feather back, or will he decide that the bird needs it more than he does?

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: The trainees are trying for their Starmap badges as they learn to navigate by the stars. Wilson and Koko quickly learn to identify the constellations – but Brewster just can’t see them. Eventually, by concentrating hard and using his imagination, he finally manages to see the ‘pictures’ in the constellations. He follows his Starmap and meets up with Koko and Wilson in Old Town where Olwin is waiting for them.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Wanting to practicing her ability to be stealthy, Farah sneaks through the tall grass to not be noticed by the birds shes approaching. But she steps on a twig, revealing her presence. Coincidentally, she finds a broken tooth to an unknown animal. She calls up the Rangers to ask for more information. Back at the ranger base, Leo is hiding behind a tree trunk momentarily before Katie calls out for him and Hero in a game of hide and seek. Hero hides behind a rock but Katie manage to see his butt. Their game was cut short when Leo receives a call from Farah, asking help on the tooth she found. After learning the tooth came from the Clouded Leopard, the Rangers travel to Farahs whereabouts to help her give back to the animal. When they arrived, Leo uses his binoculars to scan for the animal on the trees. Hero managed to find a tail nearby so he barks at it, alarming the Rangers. Turns out the tail belongs to a Long-Tailed Macaque, which immediately flee away from the encounter. The Junior Rangers were disappointed for their failed search before stumbling upon Ranger Rocky in a bush who were studying earthworms. They told Ranger Rocky about their mission, to which he contact Ranger Joey for help. Ranger Joey helps giving the Rangers additional information on the Clouded Leopard and its behaviors.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Kyle is getting ready to dive into the sea, wearing his full diving gear. As he swims underwater with the fishes, he sees something struggling from a distance. Turns out its a dolphin and its stuggling because its trapped in a fishnet, causing Kyle to call for help. In the garden, Leo And Katie are playing with bubbles, having a friendly competition on who can make the biggest bubble. They get interrupted when Kyle tell them about the dolphin encounter. After learning about the animal, Kyle tell the Junior Ranger that the animal is squirming, scared that it might be in danger. The Ranger rush to meet with Kyle by taking the PlatypusOne. Once they arrived, Leo And Katie change into their diving gear. The pair jumps into the ocean, leaving Hero behind in the vehicle. Kyle tells the Rangers they cant come close to he dolphin as it keeps moving wildly and blow water out of its blowhole. Suddenly, the dolphin begins to cry. The Rangers have an idea that they need to play music to calm the animal, that is when Ranger Rocky arrive with his Umbrella Propeller and the Rangers explain the situation to him. Katie to begin playing music with her tablet, calming the animal momentarily before Ranger Rocky jumps into the water and break apart the fishnet with his bare hands. Suddenly, the dolphin barf out small pieces of food in a cloud of colored liquid, worrying the Rangers.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Tchoupi and Nina come across a waddling hedgehog while they’re playing in the vegetable garden. When their moms explain how beneficial these cute little creatures are to gardens, the two friends decide to do everything they can to make the hedgehog feel at home among the vegetables… Until the little animal… disappears!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: When T’choupi comes down for breakfast this particular morning, he finds the kitchen in a total mess! Nina comes and tells him that the vegetable garden has also been turned upside down! Who could possibly have done this?... At first, they suspect Ciboulette the cat… until they find out that the culprit is a super cute newcomer.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Tchoupi and Nina are very excited today as Mom and Dad have organized a treasure hunt for them in the forest! Tchoupi is very confident he’ll find the treasure in no time as he and Nina have prepared for it. As they move from clue to clue, the two friends have fun discovering other aspects of the forest, but Tchoupi starts to get impatient: why’s it taking so long to find the treasure??

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: It is the end of the school day. Charley’s father has just called to warn that he will be a little late. Charley sits all alone on the bench waiting. He is afraid he is going to get bored in his now empty school… But the ever energetic Daisy shows him all the interesting things one can do at school after school!

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia have been given a great number of cheese star by Mrs Brioche. But Tony and Ella think they should share it with them. M. Grumpy decide to organize a game to bring peace back.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Its the hottest day of the year on Sodor and the sun is causing the tracks to buckle and bend. Dowager Hatt, arrives with a present for the Fat Controller - a white pith helmet to protect him from the sun explaining that white reflects heat. Meanwhile the buckled tracks cause Whiff to lose some rubbish from his trucks and a dropped bottle causes a fire. When Belle and Flynn come to the rescue, Belle is derailed and Flynn must travel on his road wheels to put out the fire. The buckled tracks are finally repaired and Thomas suggests that they paint the new tracks white (like Sir Tophams hat) which will reflect the sun and hopefully stop the tracks buckling again.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: One day two visitors come to the Island of Sodor to take pictures of interesting engines. At first Bert finds them very polite. They drive their little blue car along the line, racing ahead of him and stop to take pictures as they go past. But they don’t bother waving or saying hello and when they drive through a puddle Bert gets splashed with muddy water and decides they are very rude. He decides to get his own back by using his steam to make water rain down on them from the wet branches, but the Small Controller is not very happy with him.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou teams up with Jeffery and Jason at a soft play area to play some twin-based pranks on his family.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillous sent to his room as a punishment, but tries to escape to see his friends, imagining himself as a prisoner breaking out of jail.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The kids find some numbered papers blowing around the park. After investigating several possibilities of where they could be from, they finally figure out they were once fastened to trees in the park as part of a self-guided tour to celebrate Arbor Day. / When all the milk in Huckle’s Dad’s store turns out to be sour, Huckle, Sally and Lowly set out to find out why.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey is hungry, oh so hungry, but he cannot find anything to eat, when all of a sudden, a nut falls from above followed by another and another…it is Squirrel, his good friend! Seeing how fast Squirrel moves around, Monkey is inspired to play his favorite game… “Monkey See Monkey Do”!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Mandy tries to earn her ‘Pioneers Yoga Teaching Badge’ by teaching the rest of the Pioneers the "Upward Octopus" sequence. But constant interruptions test her patience and she ends up stuck on a cliff ledge!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: A Go-Kart Challenge goes topsy-turvy when Peters Go-Kart catches fire and sets ablaze everything in its path!

programme.title: Franklin And Friends
programme.desc: Franklin, Bear, Snail, Fox and Rabbit explore Planet Zorb in their Tree Fort Spaceship only to find Beaver and Goose already engaged in a game of Fairies. Under Franklin’s guidance, the two groups explore each other’s games instead, leading to a great time for everyone. /When Franklin and Bear find an “exploring bike” in Mr. Fox’s junkyard but then have trouble sharing it, Franklin comes up with the great solution of getting Mr. Fox to split the bicycle into two unicycles. Only thing is, riding around solo isn’t quite as fun as they’d hoped...

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Scoutbadger is detained by Edmund and asks Martis (his best friend) to take their group of friends to the hazelnut tree that Martis spotted from the top of his tree. It is full of nuts and they must collect them before the village Tomcats beat them to it. Martis is very proud of his task but on the way his ‘bossy’ attitude is catastrophic and irritates the children. Rosie decides to become leader instead but this does not please Martis at all.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Sketcky does not return, he dreamed that he had the power to fly in the air and he would have wished it lasted... Doodleboo suggests Sketcky discover a Riddleboo that can fulfill all his wildest dreams!

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Sketcky wants to make Bubble her Queen, but for that, he needs to be a king! But how does one become king? Doodleboo has a little idea of a Riddleboo.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Sketcky would like to go outside to fly his kite but it is impossible because there is not enough wind. Doodleboo suggests going to the park instead because he knows a very fun activity. What is it?

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave discover different ways to help them remember things. Using drawing, movement and simple rhymes as memory aids, they easily find their way out of a maze.

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave ask a Robot for help with some jobs. But without simple, clear instructions Robot makes a terrible mess of things.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: A Summer storm sweeps across the valley and a nervous Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends scamper into a cave with Big Nutbrown Hare. They are all safe and dry in the cave, but the thunder outside is still scary. Big Nutbrown Hare explains that noises can’t hurt you… but will he help them overcome their fears enough to enjoy the storm and the wonders of nature that it brings?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: A lazy Summer’s day brings a wonderful discovery for Little Nutbrown Hare… a tree full of bright, beautiful, tasty plums! Little Nutbrown Hare isn’t the only one enjoying the juicy summer fruit, it seems like every animal in the meadow has come for a taste. As the Summer goes on the plums disappear and Little Nutbrown Hare begins to wonder what all the animals will do without them.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare awakes to find the leaves changing colour and falling off the trees, the flowers dropping off the bushes and the tadpoles turning into frogs. Autumn is here and it’s time for change! Little Nutbrown Hare misses the joys of the Summer meadow. Will he discover that Autumn has it’s own delights?

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When the children make Eggy heads with eggs and cress seeds, Bing gets impatient and wants his cress to grow quicker so he decides to give Eggy lots of water with the garden hose.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The bunny gets jealous when Sula gives Pando more attention on a playdate. He tries to gain some for himself and ends up being pushed, so Amma show them how to get rid of the anger

programme.title: Bing Bunny

Only problem is, T’choupi pampers Cuddles so much that she keeps refusing to budge throughout the whole walk: she’d rather stop and chew on the “treats” along the way!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi is feeling a bit grumpy. He’s even refusing to play with Nina: our little hero is missing his grandparents and friends back home. But Mom reassures him: it’s normal to sometimes feel a little down when you’re away your loved - ones. To cheer him up, Dad suggests they make changes to the cottage, to remind him of his house back home, and his family! Tchoupi suddenly switches from feeling sad to feeling ecstatic! He’s eager to invite Nina to celebrate this happy day with him… but can’t find her anywhere! This gets him worrying: what if his friend took off because of how unkind he was to her this morning?

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: Its Grandfathers birthday! The Triplets want to give him an amazing present, Girl wants to offer him a rake for his garden, Poet a big hat and Turbulent wants to bought a race car. Unfortunately and despite their willingness, the Triplets dont have enough money! On Mommys good advice, they decide to team up to buy Grandfather the most amazing gift. Their choice goes for a beautiful tie which they buy and wrap up. Everything is ready for Grandfathers birthday, but thats without counting on Totos appetite.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: At dinnertime, Mommy announces to the Triplets there is a new neighbor in the building. She asks them to go welcoming her and invite her for coffee. However, Madam Gzell, the neighbor, is absolutely not a nice person. She welcomes the Triplets really harshly, all she worries about is her sick baby. When they learn there is a new baby in the building, all the Triplets want, its to play with him. But Madam Gzell is really mysterious, no one can see her "baby"! The investigation is on !

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: As the family are gathering in food for the winter, Berry becomes ill and is the focus of her parent’s attention. Edmund and Margaret are not fooled and come up with a response as they have every intention of having a relaxed moment tasting some nice, fresh redcurrant juice…

programme.desc: Caillou falls from his bicycle whilst out with Daddy and breaks his arm. Has to adapt to life in cast, which isnt very fun.

programme.desc: Percy is late to collect some sheep for an agricultural fair and bumps the wagon in his rush to be coupled up, backing into other trucks behind him. Percy is in such a hurry to collect the sheep that he doesn’t realise that there is a hole now at the back of the wagon. One by one the sheep escape without Percy realising. Thomas passes Percy and discovers the sheep and is forced to top and collect them. But the only place for the sheep to ride is in Annie or Clarabel!

programme.title: Chuggington

programme.desc: The series follows a pre-school bunny named Bing as he experiences the world around him. It uses small everyday occurrences to demonstrate how he learns new ways to manage situations with the help of his carer, Flop and friends. The programmes central phrase is "Its a Bing thing!" which Flop intones at the end of each episode when Bing has successfully conquered a troubling task or enjoyed a new childhood experience.

programme.title: Bing Bunny

programme.title: Bing Bunny - Shorts and characters

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon has found a wounded bird in the yard. With help from his younger brother Gaspard, he decides to look after him. Simon takes a real liking to the bird, he becomes his friend. He even gives him a name: Feather. With help from daddy, he builds him a nest, finds him seeds to eat. But the bird recovers and one day, flies off without Simon even noticing. Saddened by his departure, Simon looks all over for him. Finally, the bird reappears and shows Simon his real nest. Simon gets to meet the bird’s whole family and realizes how much better it is for him to be with other birds in his natural element. He is so happy that Feather has found his Mommy and Daddy again!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family

To Little Nutbrown Hare everything feels mixed up and theres no time to do all the things he wants to do. That’s until he and Little Field Mouse name it Topsy-Flopsy Day and decide to make a fun and funny day of it!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: In Winter, Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends try to find an extra special place and extra special food for Feast Day celebrations. When things go awry and nothing seems special at all, they discover that the most important thing is to be able to celebrate with those you love. Theme: celebrating with those you love.

programme.title: Boribon

They have to find the keys or therwise everyone will have to sleep on the beach tonight - which by the way, sound good to the Triplets. Maybe raking the beach could be useful? Or then metal detectors, which would allow to find all the keys of the beach.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets are watching a movie on television, when Poet starts to ask Mommy "How do you make a movie ?", she answers him that you need actors band a director to lead them and make the movie. Poet is very excited, when he’s a grown up, he wants to be a director and make animal documentaries. But his brother and sister do not agree with that, they want Poet to film them doing stunt, in a castle, with Dragons and sleeping beauties. Poor Poet will have to comply with the tantrums of his actors, not easy to do movies.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: The Mayor of Chuggington and her guests are taking a tour in Tootington and Koko must get them there in time. Along the way, Koko runs into all sorts of delays and problems. She has to make several detours and her carriage has a mechanical problem. When Koko finally reaches the meeting place for the tour, she is devastated to find that they have missed it. The Mayor isn’t upset though; she thinks that Koko’s trip around Chuggington was fantastic and it should become a regular tour.
